huntronics.name: HUNTRONICS
huntronics.description: Based on technical, Nontechnical clues and physical tasks to reach the final target. Round 1: (Day 1)Technical and non-technical clues to evaluate participants on the basis of technical and non-technical knowledge. Questions to each team will be given and from the given questions each team would decode the hidden clue within given time limit. Each team can submit maximum 2 answer for the given clues. Evaluation will be based on time and submission of correct clues.Round 2: (Day 2)It consists of various physical and non-physical activities. Evolution will be based on their performance in different activities. Criteria of evaluation for round 2 are disclosed just at the beginning of activities.Final Round: (Day 2) Qualified Top 3 teams will enter into final round. Participants will have to reach to the final destination after solving various clues and physical tasks. Evaluation will be based on the capability of teams to solve clues, various physical & mental tasks and time.
huntronics.rules: Rules:1) Any misbehavior during event would lead to team disqualification. Decisions of Judges are final.2) Qualified final team required to present in time for the further round.3) No cell phones will be allowed in the final round.4) Clothing Sports Wear for Round 2 (Day-2)5) Time limit for first round is 45 minutes.6) Time limit for Final round is 2 hours.
huntronics.time: Day1 : 10:00 to 2:00 Day-2 : 5:00 AM to 10:30 AMFinal Round (Day2) : 12:00 to 2:30
huntronics.venue: Round1: Multimedia Hall, Round-2: Play Ground & Final Round : class room
huntronics.contact: Prof. Pinkesh Patel Mobile:9978374233  Prof. Rachit Dana Mobile:9727296203
